item.title: 杰米-戴蒙在米莱的关键考验前前往阿根廷
item.description: 杰米-戴蒙（Jamie Dimon）将于本周访问阿根廷，尽管美国政府表现出前所未有的支持，但阿根廷自由主义总统仍在努力避免比索贬值。【原文：Jamie Dimon will visit Argentina this week as its libertarian president struggles to stave off a run on the peso despite an unprecedented show of support from the US government.】

item.title: 花旗银行认为，一旦民调尘埃落定，喀麦隆将寻求新的国际货币基金组织（IMF）项目
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc. ）预计，由于宏观经济压力，一旦本月早些时候举行的选举尘埃落定，喀麦隆将向国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）申请一项新计划。【原文：Citigroup Inc. expects Cameroon to tap the International Monetary Fund for a new program once the dust settles on elections held earlier this month because of macroeconomic pressures.】

item.title: 德意志银行在投资者反对后搁置百利贷款交易
item.description: Bally's Corp.试图修改约 19 亿美元一揽子债务中的部分条款，但在与贷款方的争执后陷入僵局。【原文：Bally’s Corp.’s attempt to amend part of a roughly $1.9 billion debt package has come to a standstill after a battle with lenders.】

item.title: 与瑞波结缘的财务公司将筹资逾 10 亿美元上市
item.description: 一家以持有与瑞波支付网络挂钩的加密货币 XRP 为主要目的的公司，即将通过一家空白支票公司上市。【原文：A company whose primary purpose is to hold the cryptocurrency tied to the Ripple payment network, XRP, is set to go public via a blank-check company.】

item.title: 德国 Enpal 公司完成第二笔太阳能电池板支持的债券交易
item.description: 德国住宅太阳能供应商 Enpal Gmbh 与 M&G PLC 共同设立了资产抵押贷款机制，为第二笔由太阳能电池板支持的公共债务交易铺平了道路。【原文：Enpal Gmbh, a German residential solar provider, has set up an asset-backed facility alongside M&G PLC that paves the way for a second public debt deal backed by solar panels.】

item.title: 丰业银行称加拿大股市利润可能再创新高
item.description: 丰业银行预测，最大上市公司的盈利可能在第三季度再创新高。【原文：Canada’s stock rally appears likely to get a boost from corporate profits, with Scotiabank predicting that the earnings of the biggest publicly traded companies may have jumped to another record during the third quarter.】

item.title: 美国非洲特使认为延长《非洲增长和机会法》取得积极进展
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的非洲特使表示，允许非洲国家免税进入世界最大经济体的计划在延期方面取得了进展。【原文：US President Donald Trump’s Africa envoy signaled progress toward the renewal of a program allowing African nations duty-free access to the world’s largest economy.】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司赢得亚马逊附近石油勘探长达数年之久的争夺战
item.description: 巴西国有控股能源公司获准在亚马逊河河口附近勘探石油，结束了与环境监管机构长达数年的对峙，双方争夺的焦点是如何进入这个被认为蕴藏着大量原油的盆地。【原文：Brazil’s state-controlled energy company received approval to explore for oil near the mouth of the Amazon River, capping a yearslong standoff with environmental regulators over access to a basin thought to hold vast amounts of crude.】

item.title: 马克龙称泽连斯基周五将在伦敦会见盟友
item.description: 法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙表示，乌克兰总统沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基将于周五在伦敦出席与西方盟国的会谈。【原文：Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy will attend talks with western allies in London on Friday, French President Emmanuel Macron said.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利称在 "金鸡独立 "的情况下抛售美元
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）发布的一份新研究报告称，在美国股市反弹但国债市场损失受控的 "金发姑娘 "环境下，投资者若想从中获利，应做空美元。【原文：Investors looking to profit from a “Goldilocks” environment where US stocks rally but Treasury market losses are contained should short the dollar, according to a new study published by Morgan Stanley.】

item.title: 太空探索技术公司延期迫使美国重新考虑马斯克的登月合同
item.description: 美国国家航空航天局（NASA）希望各家公司与 SpaceX 公司就其持有的一份将宇航员送上月球的合同展开竞争，这是对埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 "星际飞船"（Starship）出现延误的新一轮反击。【原文：NASA wants companies to compete with SpaceX over a contract it holds to put astronauts on the moon, a fresh sign of blowback over delays with Elon Musk’s Starship spacecraft.】

item.title: 巴西对冲基金表现优于基准基金，看涨押注见效
item.description: 对冲基金正加倍押注本地资产，坚持其成功策略，使这些公司自 2022 年以来首次跑赢基准。【原文：Hedge funds are doubling down on bullish bets in local assets, sticking to a winning strategy that put the firms on track to beat their benchmark for the first time since 2022.】

item.title: 欧洲央行施纳贝尔称欧元作用强大，应予以加强
item.description: 欧洲中央银行执行董事会成员伊莎贝尔-施纳贝尔重申，应加强欧元的国际作用。【原文：European Central Bank Executive Board member Isabel Schnabel reiterated that the international role of the euro should be enhanced.】

item.title: MTA 在收费计划法律诉讼中出售 2.3 亿美元债务
item.description: 纽约市的交通网络正在寻求筹集 2.3 亿美元的短期债务，为今年早些时候实施的拥堵收费计划所需的基础设施提供资金。【原文：New York City’s transit network is seeking to raise $230 million in short-term debt to finance needed infrastructure for its congestion toll plan implemented earlier this year.】

item.title: Blackstone 为与英国仓库相关的 5.07 亿英镑 CMBS 定价
item.description: 据一位熟悉该交易的人士透露，Blackstone Inc. 已完成了与英国仓库相关的 2025 年的第二次债务出售，以充分利用网络购物物流的无情需求。【原文：Blackstone Inc. has completed its second debt sale of 2025 linked to UK warehouses, according to a person familiar with the transaction, as it capitalizes on relentless demand for online shopping logistics.】

item.title: 美国股市延续涨势，原因是苹果公司接近历史最高纪录，盈利超预期
item.description: 受与中国的贸易紧张局势可能缓解的迹象推动，标普 500 指数连续第二天上涨。好于预期的企业盈利趋势和苹果公司（Apple Inc.【原文：The S&P 500 rose into a second day, helped by signs trade tensions with China may be easing. Better-than-expected corporate earnings trends and a rally for Apple Inc., which neared a record as analysts highlighted improving iPhone demand trends, also boosted sentiment.】

item.title: 加拿大将成立金融犯罪署打击激增的网络诈骗
item.description: 加拿大正在启动一个新的金融犯罪机构，并对银行法进行修改，以打击网上欺诈和其他骗局。【原文：Canada is launching a new financial crimes agency and making changes to banking laws to clamp down on online fraud and other scams.】

item.title: 加拿大银行调查显示企业无法摆脱贸易悲观情绪
item.description: 加拿大银行对企业的调查显示，尽管企业对通胀的预期有所缓解，但仍担心持续的贸易战会限制其销售。【原文：The Bank of Canada’s survey of businesses shows firms are still worried the ongoing trade war will limit their sales, though their expectations for inflation eased.】

item.title: 在普朗托撤回报价后，戴伊& 达勒姆跌至历史最低点
item.description: 投资公司 Plantro Ltd. 撤回了收购法律软件供应商 Dye & Durham Ltd. 的提案，称董事会对这一想法兴趣不大。该公司股价暴跌，创下历史新低。【原文：Investment company Plantro Ltd. withdrew a proposal to acquire legal software provider Dye & Durham Ltd., saying the board didn’t show much interest in the idea. The shares plunged to a record low.】

item.title: 停摆僵局让美国 IPO 持币观望者不再观望
item.description: 尽管政府停摆问题挥之不去，但准备在美国上市的公司仍在大力推进非常规的 IPO 计划，这让华尔街的许多人大吃一惊。【原文：Companies on deck to go public in the US are powering forward with unconventional IPO plans despite the lingering government shutdown, taking many on Wall Street by surprise.】

item.title: 巴拿马将在科布雷铜矿谈判中坚持资源所有权
item.description: 巴拿马财政部长在接受采访时说，巴拿马将要求任何重启价值 100 亿美元的 Cobre Panama 铜矿的协议都必须明确规定该国是土地和资源的所有者。【原文：Panama will require that any agreement to restart the $10 billion Cobre Panama copper mine clearly stipulates that the country is the owner of the land and the resources, the country’s finance chief said in an interview.】

item.title: 马斯克薪酬遭更多反对，Glass Lewis 敦促投 "反对 "票
item.description: 第二家主要代理顾问公司敦促特斯拉公司股东投票反对首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）1 万亿美元的薪酬方案，为这家汽车制造商董事会争取投资者支持增添了潜在障碍。【原文：Tesla Inc. shareholders are being urged by a second major proxy adviser to vote against Chief Executive Officer Elon Musk’s $1 trillion compensation package, adding to potential hurdles as the carmaker’s board works to secure investor support.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚与美国冲突升级有可能破坏债券涨势
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普指责哥伦比亚总统古斯塔沃-佩特罗是 "非法毒品头目"，引发了对经济报复的担忧，哥伦比亚美元债券周一全线下跌，挫伤了近期的涨势。【原文：Colombian dollar bonds fell across the curve on Monday, denting their recent rally, after US President Donald Trump accused his counterpart Gustavo Petro of being an “illegal drug leader,” triggering fears of economic retaliation.】

item.title: 埃塞俄比亚与中国商谈将美元贷款兑换成人民币事宜
item.description: 埃塞俄比亚开始与中国谈判，将其欠中国政府的 53.8 亿美元中的至少一部分转换成人民币贷款，以肯尼亚为榜样，支持中国将其货币国际化的努力。【原文：Ethiopia started talks with China to convert at least part of the $5.38 billion it owes Beijing into yuan-denominated loans, following an example set by Kenya that bolsters China’s efforts to internationalize its currency.】

item.title: Truist 寻求在地区银行担忧之际出售高等级债券
item.description: Truist Financial Corp. 周一开始出售投资级债券，上周对一些地区性银行亏损的担忧曾短暂地引发了更广泛的信贷担忧。【原文：Truist Financial Corp. kicked off a sale of investment-grade bonds Monday, after concern last week about losses at some regional banks briefly stoked broader credit worries.】

item.title: 电池制造商继续推进海外业务，CATL 利润增长 41
item.description: 当代安培瑞斯科技有限公司（Amperex Technology Co.作为全球最大的电动汽车电池制造商，该公司第三季度利润大幅增长，巩固了在中国市场的领先地位，并进一步进军海外市场。【原文：Contemporary Amperex Technology Co. Ltd.’s profit jumped in the third quarter, as the world’s largest maker of electric vehicle batteries defended its lead in China and pushed further into overseas markets.】

item.title: Oura 为其智能戒指准备了类似 Apple Watch 的高血压检测功能
item.description: 芬兰智能戒指制造商 Oura Health Oy 是最近一家寻求进军血压监测领域的可穿戴设备公司。【原文：Oura Health Oy, the Finnish smart ring maker, is the latest wearable company seeking to move into blood pressure monitoring.】

item.title: 波兰图书和音乐零售商 Empik 据称计划在华沙首次公开募股
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，波兰图书、音乐和学校用品零售商 Empik SA 计划明年在华沙证券交易所进行首次公开募股。【原文：Polish book, music and school supply retailer Empik SA is planning an initial public offering on the Warsaw Stock Exchange next year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 苹果接近历史新高，因为 Loop 认为 iPhone 需求有 25% 的上升空间
item.description: 在 Loop Capital 将苹果公司股票评级从 "持有 "上调至 "买入 "后，苹果公司股价周一开盘将接近历史最高水平。【原文：Apple Inc. shares are poised to open near record levels on Monday after Loop Capital upgraded the stock to buy from hold, the latest firm to cite more positive iPhone demand trends.】

item.title: 阿根廷中央银行与美国财政部签署 200 亿美元互换协议
item.description: 阿根廷货币管理局周一在一份新闻稿中宣布，阿根廷央行与美国财政部签署了一项 200 亿美元的互换额度协议。【原文：Argentina’s central bank and the US Treasury have signed a swap line agreement for $20 billion, the monetary authority announced in a press release Monday.】
